Uses of Class
assignement2.WineStoreSystem

  • Uses of WineStoreSystem in assignement2

    Methods in assignement2 with parameters of type WineStoreSystem
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void Employee.buyFinischedBottles​(WineStoreSystem ws, Wine w)
    This method is used by employee to buy new bottles when there are no more available.
    static void Employee.buyNewBottles​(WineStoreSystem ws)
    This method is used by employee to satisfy the registered user's requirements.
    void User.buyWine​(WineStoreSystem ws)
    This method is used from the user to buy new bottles of a specific wine.
